backend/main.mo: Main Motoko actor for the application, implementing candidate admission management, gallery, news, and admin/super-admin role management with mobile number validation and blob storage mixins.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report confirming that the mobile number validation in AdmissionFormPage.tsx was updated to accept exactly 10-digit Indian numbers with a Hindi error message, removing Pakistani format logic.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Auto-generated JSON summaries of all frontend source files, describing each component, page, hook, and style file's purpose and recent changes.
frontend/index.css: Base Tailwind CSS file defining OKLCH-based CSS custom properties for light and dark color themes including background, foreground, chart, and sidebar variables.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point for the React app with the title 'करणी सेना युवा शक्ति' and a root div that mounts the main.tsx module.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Root React component that sets up TanStack Router with routes for home, admission, admin (protected), and reprint pages, wrapped in ThemeProvider and Toaster.
frontend/src/components/AccessDeniedScre: Full-page access denied UI component with a Hindi heading, description, and a link button to return to the home page.
frontend/src/components/AdminCandidatesL: Admin component that fetches and displays all admission candidates in an accordion list with photo, admission ID badge, and detailed fields per candidate.
frontend/src/components/AdminGalleryMana: Admin gallery management component that allows authenticated admins to add images with descriptions and delete existing gallery items, with authorization checks and error handling.
frontend/src/components/AdminManagementS: React component for managing admins, allowing authenticated users to add/remove admins by principal ID and reset the admin system, with confirmation dialogs and toast notifications.
frontend/src/components/AdminNewsManager: React component for admin CRUD operations on news posts, featuring a form for creating/editing news items and a list with delete confirmation dialogs.
frontend/src/components/AdmissionCard.ts: Renders a printable ISO ID-card-sized admission card with a saffron/gold theme displaying applicant details (name, photo, DOB, etc.) and a print button.
frontend/src/components/GallerySection.t: Displays a responsive photo gallery grid fetched from the backend, with loading skeletons and an empty-state message in Hindi.
frontend/src/components/ImageUploadField: A reusable image upload field supporting drag-and-drop and file selection, with preview, upload progress, and removal functionality using the ExternalBlob type.
frontend/src/components/Layout.tsx: Main application layout with a sticky header, desktop and mobile navigation links, and Internet Identity login/logout handling using TanStack Router.
frontend/src/components/NewsSection.tsx: Displays a sorted list of news items in a responsive card grid with loading skeletons and an empty state, fetched via useGetAllNewsItems hook.
frontend/src/components/ProfileSetupModa: Modal dialog that prompts authenticated users without a profile to enter their name, then saves it via useSaveCallerUserProfile; cannot be dismissed until completed.
frontend/src/components/ProtectedRoute.t: Route guard that checks authentication and admin status, attempts super admin initialization if needed, and renders an AccessDeniedScreen or a loading spinner otherwise.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and caches a backend actor (authenticated or anonymous) using React Query, initializing access control with an admin token and invalidating dependent queries when the actor changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useAddAdmin.ts: Mutation hook that calls the backend addAdmin method with a Principal and invalidates the admins query on success.
frontend/src/hooks/useAddGalleryItem.ts: Mutation hook that uploads a gallery image with a description to the backend and invalidates the galleryItems query on success.
frontend/src/hooks/useCreateNewsItem.ts: Mutation hook that creates a new news item (title, content, createdAt) on the backend and invalidates the newsItems query on success.
Mutation hook that deletes a gallery item by description and invalidates the galleryItems query on success.
frontend/src/hooks/useDeleteNewsItem.ts: Mutation hook that deletes a news item by title and invalidates the newsItems query on success.
frontend/src/hooks/useEditNewsItem.ts: Mutation hook that edits an existing news item's content and timestamp and invalidates the newsItems query on success.
frontend/src/hooks/useGetAdmins.ts: Query hook that fetches the list of admins from the backend, enabled only when the actor and identity are available.
frontend/src/hooks/useGetAllCandidates.t: Query hook that fetches all candidates from the backend, enabled only when authenticated with a valid actor.
frontend/src/hooks/useGetAllNewsItems.ts: Query hook that fetches all news items from the backend whenever the actor is ready.
frontend/src/hooks/useGetCallerUserProfi: Query hook that fetches the current caller's user profile, exposing combined loading state that accounts for actor initialization.
frontend/src/hooks/useGetCandidateByMobi: Mutation hook that looks up a candidate by mobile number and returns the result or null.
frontend/src/hooks/useGetGalleryItems.ts: Query hook that fetches all gallery items from the backend when the actor is available.
frontend/src/hooks/useInitializeSuperAdm: Mutation hook that calls initializeSuperAdmin on the backend and invalidates admin-related queries on success.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides an InternetIdentityProvider and useInternetIdentity hook that manage AuthClient lifecycle, login/logout, and expose identity and login status to the component tree.
frontend/src/hooks/useIsCallerAdmin.ts: Query hook that checks whether the current caller is an admin, enabled only when authenticated with a valid actor.
frontend/src/hooks/useRemoveAdmin.ts: Mutation hook that removes an admin by Principal and invalidates the admins query on success.
frontend/src/hooks/useResetAdminSystem.t: Mutation hook that force-resets the admin system on the backend and invalidates both admins and isCallerAdmin queries.
frontend/src/hooks/useSaveCallerUserProf: Mutation hook that saves the caller's user profile to the backend and invalidates the currentUserProfile query on success.
frontend/src/hooks/useSubmitAdmissionFor: React Query mutation hook that submits an admission form to the backend actor, handles mobile-already-registered errors, and returns a generated temporary admission ID on success.
frontend/src/index.css: Global CSS file that sets up Tailwind, defines a warm traditional OKLCH color palette for light/dark modes, and includes print styles for rendering an admission ID card at credit-card dimensions.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Application entry point that mounts the React app with QueryClientProvider and InternetIdentityProvider wrappers.
frontend/src/pages/AdminPanel.tsx: Admin panel page with a sidebar navigation that switches between four sections: Admission Applications, Photo Gallery, News & Updates, and Manage Admins.
frontend/src/pages/AdmissionFormPage.tsx: Admission form page with client-side validation (including Indian mobile number format), photo upload, and displays an AdmissionCard on successful submission.
frontend/src/pages/HomePage.tsx: Home page featuring a hero section with a call-to-action for admission, followed by Gallery and News sections.
frontend/src/pages/ReprintIdCardPage.tsx: Page that lets users search for their admission record by mobile number and reprint their ID card if found.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utility module providing functions to read URL/hash query parameters, persist them in sessionStorage, and clean sensitive parameters from the URL hash without reloading.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration for the frontend, extending the default theme with custom OKLCH-based colors, border radii, box shadows, keyframe animations, and enabling typography, container queries, and animate plugins.
project_state.json: Tracks the current state of the Aavedan Form project, recording existing features, pending fix requests, and architectural notes—primarily focused on fixing mobile number validation to accept 10-digit Indian format with Hindi error messages.
